name: Infinity-Back-End
description: ## Installing * Clone project and run the command `npm i`. ## Developing * You can run the command `npm run dev` to start a babel-node server using nodemon. Browser access is at `http://localhost:3000/`. ## Building * Compile with babel using the command `npm run build`. The compiled files will be in the `/server` directory. ## Testing * You can run automated tests using Mocha and Chai with `npm test`. ## Running * The compiled project can be run with the command `npm start`.
